title: Create FO-09 app directory, types.ts, and copy base step components
description:
Create the FO-09 app directory structure and copy base components from FO-08.

1. Create directory: app/fo-09/components/
2. Create app/fo-09/types.ts based on FO-08's types.ts with these changes:
   - REMOVE reflectiveStatement from DynamicScreenResponse interface
   - Keep GatheringContext, FirstScreenFragmentsResponse, FO09GenerateBatchOptions (rename from FO08)
   - Add FO09GenerateBatchResult type
   - Keep FIXED_OPENING_QUESTION constant

3. Copy these step components AS-IS from app/fo-08/components/:
   - step-welcome.tsx
   - step-familiarity.tsx
   - step-topics.tsx
   - heart-animation.tsx
   - step-background.tsx
   - step-notifications.tsx
   - step-paywall.tsx
   - step-completion.tsx (will be modified later to show all accumulated affirmations)

Important: Update any imports that reference 'fo-08' to 'fo-09' in the copied files.
